data.name: Centurion Mall - Well positioned white box space
data.description: Centurion Mall white box space suitable for a variety of retailers.
data.address1: Centurion Mall, Centurion Central, Centurion, South Africa
data.full_address: Centurion Mall, Centurion Central, Centurion, South Africa
data.about_space:
This space is located near entrance 6, off the malls large parkade, giving it great exposure and ease of access for visitors.

Centurion Mall is located in the city centre, within walking distance from the Gautrain Station and just off the N1 highway. It is a unique space, featuring a partly open-air design and magnificent art-installations that both create a bright and inviting atmosphere for its' 14 million guests annually. 
It is home to over 250 tenants, consisting of South Africa's top restaurants, fashion retailers, grocery stores, cinemas, and more - this, along with its' great positioning promises a high foot flow from all surrounding communities.
This space is located near entrance 6, off the malls large parkade, giving it great exposure and ease of access for visitors.
data.neighbouring_stores: Popular fashion retailers: DMF and Queenspark are neighbours, opposite is Contempo. Cape Union Mart and Miladys are nearby, down the walkway.
data.rules_of_space: No hobby or cell/gadget related shops will be permitted for this space.
data.few_things_to_know: Rates, utilities and taxes are not included in the quoted rates. The quoted rate is exclusively for pop-up shops (3-month rentals), a higher rate will be quoted for long-term rentals.

data.name: River Square - Compact white box space
data.description: River Square - white box space suitable for variety of uses
data.address1: River Square Shopping Centre, Nile Drive, Three Rivers, Vereeniging, South Africa
data.full_address: River Square Shopping Centre, Nile Drive, Three Rivers, Vereeniging, South Africa
data.about_space:
River Square is situated in the suburb of Three Rivers in the town of Vereeniging. The Centre is centrally located, off General Hertzog Road, which runs from the CBD of Vereeniging through the major residential areas located to the North and East of the CBD. This location on a major arterial road also makes the Centre easily accessible from the regional area surrounding Vereeniging.
The Centre is maintained on a high level, has a large catchment area and draws in a steady stream of customers all day, every day.
This white box space brings a great opportunity to showcase your retail idea in a high traffic section of River Square.
data.neighbouring_stores: Verimark & Leather Leisure are direct neighbours, Pick n Pay entrance is a shop down the walkway.
data.rules_of_space: No specific rules.
data.few_things_to_know: Rates, utilities and taxes are not included in the quoted rates.

data.name: Longbeach Mall - Restaurant for rent
data.description: Longbeach Mall - Restaurant for rent
data.address1: Longbeach Mall, Buller Louw Boulevard, Noordhoek, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: Longbeach Mall, Buller Louw Boulevard, Noordhoek, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
Located at a busy entrance to the Mall, this restaurant space has large windows and plenty of natural light. Its a great spot to introduce your F&B idea to Noordhoek's locals.

Longbeach Mall is located in Noordhoek one of the most picturesque areas of the Cape. It boasts all shoppers need to enjoy a stress-free lifestyle.With over 80 stores and restaurants, all on one level, and loads of free parking bays to choose from, it offers a world of convenience and wonder.The centre is also the proud host of a bi-weekly artisanal food market and a monthly arts and crafts market that bring to life the passions and talents of the surrounding community.
data.neighbouring_stores: Cell C, MTN, Nedbank
data.rules_of_space:
This space is only suitable for a restaurant.
A marketing contribution of 2,5% is not included in the quoted rental. Utilities are also not included.
data.few_things_to_know: There is a lot of work that needs to be done on this space. A tenant installation allowance could be available depending on the lease period.

data.name: 27 Boxes - Stylish retail store for rent
data.description: 27 Boxes - Stylish retail store
data.address1: 27 Boxes, 4th Avenue, Melville, Johannesburg, South Africa
data.full_address: 27 Boxes, 4th Avenue, Melville, Johannesburg, South Africa
data.about_space: This elegant white boxed container is well positioned for a fashion brand to launch and make a statement . It has beautiful wooden floors and a large glass storefront which provides plenty of natural light.. 27 Boxes has a classic arcade feel, visitors are treated to a taste of Melville's worldly hospitality. Quirky stores, hip cafes and independent restaurants pour into walkways accompanied by uplifting music and the sounds of great conversation. No idea is too outlandish for Melville, the locals welcome new independent brands with open arms. This is a destination with a difference offering unique social spaces, interesting retail and contemporary eateries housed in over 100 shipping containers.
data.neighbouring_stores: ZAZA Clothing
data.rules_of_space: No specific rules.
data.few_things_to_know: The rate quoted is all inclusive

data.name: Newtown Junction - Large Fashion Store
data.description: Newtown Junction - Large Fashion Space
data.address1: Newtown Junction, Carr Street, Newtown, Johannesburg, South Africa
data.full_address: Newtown Junction, Carr Street, Newtown, Johannesburg, South Africa
data.about_space:
Situated in the artistic heartland of Newtown, this is a large and bright white box space is a great opportunity to introduce your brand to the city's shoppers. It has large shop windows that are ideal for showcasing your brand and products.
The Newtown Junction development was designed with the original architecture of the old Johannesburg produce market in mind. Its's close to some of Jo'burg's biggeste attractions such as the Market Theatre, OrientalPlaza, SAB World of Beer, Sci Bono Centre & Nelson Mandela Bridge.  Centrally located in Newtown, Johannesburg and is easily accessed from the M1 North via Carr Street and the M1 South via the eastern entrance and exit
The property include: 100 retailers, including Pick n Pay, Shoprite and Sterkinekor, There are ± 960 parking bays.
data.neighbouring_stores: This space is located in the fashion area of The Mall and has Total Sports, Planet Fitness, Exact and  Markham as neighbours.
data.rules_of_space: Rates and taxes are R 15,66 per m2 and meter reading R 3,40 per m2. CID levies, aircon recoveries and refuse are charged on a pro rata basis. Turnover rental is 8% if applicable.
data.few_things_to_know: This is a large space and will require a lot of product and shop fittings to make it look its best.

data.name: V&A Waterfront Lampside Court promotion space
data.description: V&A Waterfront Lampside Court promotion space
data.address1: V&A Waterfront, Dock Road, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: V&A Waterfront, Dock Road, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
This spacious area is located at Upper Entrance 2 ans is surrounded by sporting and fashion brands. With an atmosphere like no other, The V&A Waterfront is internationally recognised as one of the world’s finest mixed-use waterfront developments. The Victoria Wharf Shopping Centre offers a unique mix of retail opportunities from well – loved South African stores
to premium luxury retail, which draws consumers from every sphere. The V&A is Africa's most visited tourist destination with almost 24 million visitors per annum.
The V&A's current closing time is 7pm due to Covid restrictions. The V&A are open to discussions on shorter rental periods. Higher seasonal rates will be effective from 1 November.
data.neighbouring_stores: Sorbet, Sportscene, Col'Cacchio
data.rules_of_space: Shell schemes and solid display boards will not be permitted if they are deemed to constitute a blocking wall that will obstruct the sight lines of the surrounding stores. Promotions must be confined to the parameters of the Promotional Court. A single-phase electrical point is available at all Promotional Courts. Promoters must provide a suitable quality extension cable, of sufficient length to reach the nearest plug outlet [as indicated by the V&A]. The extension cables and ALL wiring must be securely fixed to the floor with duct tape [colour of flooring] or tucked underneath the flooring. No cables may be exposed in any way.					Promoters will not be permitted to conduct sales from the Promotional Courts. Temporary flooring is compulsory at all Promotional Courts. No carpeting is allowed and laminated or tiled flooring is preferred. Vinyl flooring must be applied to a base and not directly to our mall tiles. Flooring must have sloped edging with ‘mind you step’ applied to the sloped edging. In the event of tape being used, the Promoter must ensure that the mall tiles are not damaged upon dismantling. The promotion of other property companies or shopping centres  will not be permitted at the V&A.
data.few_things_to_know: This space is 5x4m.  V&A Promotional court bookings run from Tuesdays to Mondays. A 1.5m height restriction applies to all displays in the Promotional Courts.
data.how_sm_works:
How SpaceMatch works:

  • 1. Select your dates to book
  • 2. Ask questions and visit the space. We’re here to help when you need it
  • 3. Manage legal information and payment online
  • 4. Book the space as easily as a hotel room

data.name: Table Bay Mall Exhibition space l Anchor Court
data.description: Table Bay Mall Exhibition Space outside Pandora
data.address1: Table Bay Mall, Sunningdale, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: Table Bay Mall, Sunningdale, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
Located in the middle of the Mall leading off from Captain's (Center) Court, sits the charming Anchor Court. It is positioned in the vicinity of the lift lobby with a complementing state of the art Digital Video Wall, offering additional advertising opportunities, and has 360 degree line of sight allowing for exceptional access and visibility. Along with the surrounding premium stores and our elegant baby grand piano, this court creates the perfect picturesque location to display and market top end brands. 

The court size : up to 3 x 3 sqm
Discounted weekend and weekly rates available.

Table Bay Mall is a 65 000/sqm shopping centre situated on the corner of the R27 and Berkshire Boulevard in Sunningdale, Cape Town. It is the largest regional shopping mall in the area, positioned to offer a unique shopping experience to a fast-growing residential expansion corridor along Cape Town's West Coast. Its unique, modern design inspired by the curved, flowing lines of the world's most elegant Super Yacht's, brings in a sense of space and natural light to the building to allow for a relaxing shopping experience.  Its has five beautiful exhibition courts and 3 state of the art Digital Video Walls located around the lift lobby's, offering great opportunities for brands to advertise and market themselves. Maturing into the market as it turns 3 in September, we receive an average Footfall of 550 000 people per month, a high basket spend per head of R230 and year on year growth of 14%.
data.neighbouring_stores: H&M, Woolworths, Pandora, Cellini, Tread & Miller, Poetry, Exclusive Books, The Pause Room, Foschini, Truworths, The Wellness Warehouse.
data.rules_of_space:
Height restriction of 1.5m. No Gazebo's or roof coverings allowed. Flooring requirement subject to approval. Cleaning and addition security is the exhibitors own responsibility. Built displays/stands are subject to plan approval. Exhibitors are to adhere to Mall trading hours. The weekend rate for this space is R 6,000.
No selling is permitted from the stand.
data.few_things_to_know: Setup & Removal : Before or after Mall trading hours. Rates specified exclude parking, additional security and stand equipment. All exhibitions are subject to final approval from landlord.

data.name: Eikestad Mall shop to rent I  Fashion, Beauty or Lifestyle store
data.description: Eikestad Mall - Fashion, Beauty or Lifestyle store
data.address1: Eikestad Mall, Andringa Street, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: Eikestad Mall, Andringa Street, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
This busy space is  located at the Woolworths entrance to the Mall. It is a corner unit opposite the Absa & Capitec ATMs. The surrounding  key tenants ensure consistently high foot traffic.

 Eikestad Mall is situated in the heart of Stellenbosch, the second oldest town in South Africa. The Mall has been part of the Stellenbosch CBD since the 1970s and continues to grow with the town, in order to meet shoppers’ evolving needs. This modern mixed-use development offers over 100 shops, including fashion, health & beauty, restaurants, fast food, groceries, services as well as exclusive office space. With anchor tenants like Woolworths, Checkers, Game, Truworths, Foschini, Clicks, Ackermans and Food Lover's Market, together with a variety of smaller retailers, including two General Health Practitioners, a podiatrist, physiotherapist, optometrist and a dentist, shoppers will find everything their heart desires under one roof. For added convenience and peace of mind, there are undercover parking bays, with entrances from Plein, Bird and Andringa Streets, as well as 24-hour security. Whether it's daily essentials, little luxuries or a delicious treat, Eikestad Mall has it all.
data.neighbouring_stores: Clicks, Woolworths, The Body Shop, At Home, Identity, Ackermans, Hungry Lion, American Swiss.
data.rules_of_space:
No food tenants.
House rules available on request.
data.few_things_to_know:
The Mall owners would like a high trading density tenant. The floor space will need to be used to its maximum potential.

The rental quoted excludes utiliities of approximately R 960 per month.

data.address1: Mall of Africa, Lone Creek Crescent, Waterval 5-Ir, Midrand, South Africa
data.full_address: Mall of Africa, Lone Creek Crescent, Waterval 5-Ir, Midrand, South Africa
data.about_space: This space is ideal for a fashion, beauty brand or lifestyle brand. Formerly Red Square:, its a white box space that's well situated with lots of foot traffic.  Mall of Africa is home to over 300 shops, many of which are flagship stores. Perfectly situated between Johannesburg and Pretoria, it is the heart of Waterfall – a city developed on a scale beyond anything South Africa has known.

Bras 'n Thing
Maxhosa

Turnover of 8%.

data.address1: V&A Waterfront, Dock Road, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: V&A Waterfront, Dock Road, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
This spacious area is located at Upper Entrance 2 ans is surrounded by sporting and fashion brands. With an atmosphere like no other, The V&A Waterfront is internationally recognised as one of the world’s finest mixed-use waterfront developments. The Victoria Wharf Shopping Centre offers a unique mix of retail opportunities from well – loved South African stores
to premium luxury retail, which draws consumers from every sphere. The V&A is Africa's most visited tourist destination with almost 24 million visitors per annum.
The V&A's current closing time is 7pm due to Covid restrictions. The V&A are open to discussions on shorter rental periods. Higher seasonal rates will be effective from 1 November.

data.rules_of_space: Shell schemes and solid display boards will not be permitted if they are deemed to constitute a blocking wall that will obstruct the sight lines of the surrounding stores. Promotions must be confined to the parameters of the Promotional Court. A single-phase electrical point is available at all Promotional Courts. Promoters must provide a suitable quality extension cable, of sufficient length to reach the nearest plug outlet [as indicated by the V&A]. The extension cables and ALL wiring must be securely fixed to the floor with duct tape [colour of flooring] or tucked underneath the flooring. No cables may be exposed in any way.					Promoters will not be permitted to conduct sales from the Promotional Courts. Temporary flooring is compulsory at all Promotional Courts. No carpeting is allowed and laminated or tiled flooring is preferred. Vinyl flooring must be applied to a base and not directly to our mall tiles. Flooring must have sloped edging with ‘mind you step’ applied to the sloped edging. In the event of tape being used, the Promoter must ensure that the mall tiles are not damaged upon dismantling. The promotion of other property companies or shopping centres  will not be permitted at the V&A.
data.few_things_to_know: This space is 5x4m.  V&A Promotional court bookings run from Tuesdays to Mondays. A 1.5m height restriction applies to all displays in the Promotional Courts.

data.name: Table Bay Mall Exhibition space l Anchor Court
data.description: Table Bay Mall Exhibition Space outside Pandora
data.address1: Table Bay Mall, Sunningdale, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: Table Bay Mall, Sunningdale, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
Located in the middle of the Mall leading off from Captain's (Center) Court, sits the charming Anchor Court. It is positioned in the vicinity of the lift lobby with a complementing state of the art Digital Video Wall, offering additional advertising opportunities, and has 360 degree line of sight allowing for exceptional access and visibility. Along with the surrounding premium stores and our elegant baby grand piano, this court creates the perfect picturesque location to display and market top end brands. 

The court size : up to 3 x 3 sqm
Discounted weekend and weekly rates available.

Table Bay Mall is a 65 000/sqm shopping centre situated on the corner of the R27 and Berkshire Boulevard in Sunningdale, Cape Town. It is the largest regional shopping mall in the area, positioned to offer a unique shopping experience to a fast-growing residential expansion corridor along Cape Town's West Coast. Its unique, modern design inspired by the curved, flowing lines of the world's most elegant Super Yacht's, brings in a sense of space and natural light to the building to allow for a relaxing shopping experience.  Its has five beautiful exhibition courts and 3 state of the art Digital Video Walls located around the lift lobby's, offering great opportunities for brands to advertise and market themselves. Maturing into the market as it turns 3 in September, we receive an average Footfall of 550 000 people per month, a high basket spend per head of R230 and year on year growth of 14%.
data.neighbouring_stores: H&M, Woolworths, Pandora, Cellini, Tread & Miller, Poetry, Exclusive Books, The Pause Room, Foschini, Truworths, The Wellness Warehouse.
data.rules_of_space:
Height restriction of 1.5m. No Gazebo's or roof coverings allowed. Flooring requirement subject to approval. Cleaning and addition security is the exhibitors own responsibility. Built displays/stands are subject to plan approval. Exhibitors are to adhere to Mall trading hours. The weekend rate for this space is R 6,000.
No selling is permitted from the stand.
data.few_things_to_know: Setup & Removal : Before or after Mall trading hours. Rates specified exclude parking, additional security and stand equipment. All exhibitions are subject to final approval from landlord.

data.name: Eikestad Mall shop to rent I  Fashion, Beauty or Lifestyle store
data.description: Eikestad Mall - Fashion, Beauty or Lifestyle store
data.address1: Eikestad Mall, Andringa Street, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, South Africa
data.full_address: Eikestad Mall, Andringa Street, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, South Africa
data.about_space:
This busy space is  located at the Woolworths entrance to the Mall. It is a corner unit opposite the Absa & Capitec ATMs. The surrounding  key tenants ensure consistently high foot traffic.

 Eikestad Mall is situated in the heart of Stellenbosch, the second oldest town in South Africa. The Mall has been part of the Stellenbosch CBD since the 1970s and continues to grow with the town, in order to meet shoppers’ evolving needs. This modern mixed-use development offers over 100 shops, including fashion, health & beauty, restaurants, fast food, groceries, services as well as exclusive office space. With anchor tenants like Woolworths, Checkers, Game, Truworths, Foschini, Clicks, Ackermans and Food Lover's Market, together with a variety of smaller retailers, including two General Health Practitioners, a podiatrist, physiotherapist, optometrist and a dentist, shoppers will find everything their heart desires under one roof. For added convenience and peace of mind, there are undercover parking bays, with entrances from Plein, Bird and Andringa Streets, as well as 24-hour security. Whether it's daily essentials, little luxuries or a delicious treat, Eikestad Mall has it all.
data.neighbouring_stores: Clicks, Woolworths, The Body Shop, At Home, Identity, Ackermans, Hungry Lion, American Swiss.
data.rules_of_space:
No food tenants.
House rules available on request.
data.few_things_to_know:
The Mall owners would like a high trading density tenant. The floor space will need to be used to its maximum potential.

The rental quoted excludes utiliities of approximately R 960 per month.

Mall of Africa is home to over 300 shops, many of which are flagship stores. Perfectly situated between Johannesburg and Pretoria, it is the heart of Waterfall – a city developed on a scale beyond anything South Africa has known.

Turnover of 8%.
